verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5927"\w* \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w laid|strong="H5927"\w* siege \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w* said \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Make|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5647"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* replied, “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* treaty \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* condition, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w*’s \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H7760"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.”

“Hold \w off|strong="H7651"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*,” replied \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. If \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w surrender|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* relayed \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hearing \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w aloud|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w Just|strong="H1697"\w* \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* returning \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w behind|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*. “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* troubles \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?” \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*. “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w*?” \w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* relayed \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*.

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* God \w rushed|strong="H6743"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w anger|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pair|strong="H6776"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w cut|strong="H5408"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w pieces|strong="H5408"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, proclaiming, “\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w march|strong="H3318"\w* \w behind|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w terror|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Saul \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* Bezek, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* 300,000 \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 30,000 \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w they|strong="H3541"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H4397"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, “\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* men \w of|strong="H4397"\w* \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*: ‘\w Deliverance|strong="H8668"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* yours \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w time|strong="H4279"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w hot|strong="H2527"\w*.’” \w And|strong="H1568"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w relayed|strong="H5046"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* men \w of|strong="H4397"\w* \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*, \w they|strong="H3541"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* Nahash, “\w Tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w seems|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H5221"\w* \w next|strong="H4283"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* organized \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w divisions|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* watch \w they|strong="H3117"\w* invaded \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H5983"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w slaughtered|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* hottest \w part|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w survivors|strong="H7604"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* said \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w should|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*? \w Bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w here|strong="H5921"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* ordered, “\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w worked|strong="H6213"\w* \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.”

Then \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, “\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w renew|strong="H2318"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* kingship \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3966"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* confirmed \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*.
